price: ߛߴߊ߬ ߘߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߛߊ߬ߙߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߝߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߎ߯ ߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߢߊ߬ߒߡߊ߭ ߘߏ߫ ߟߊ߫ ، ߓߊ ߡߊߞߕߏߟߌߟߊ߫ ߞߏߢߌߡߊߟߐ߲ߠߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: liyuwaffiyahum ujūrahum wayazīdahum min faḍlihi innahu ghafūrun shakūrun
translations: That He may give them in full
